byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield, Li Bibo and Shi Da contributed research.

abstract: Political analysts and pundits across China are grasping at straws in an effort to divine who might run China after Pres Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao step down in 2012.
snippet: Political junkies are paying close attention to the People’s Daily to try to divine who might run China after President Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao step down in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Political junkies are paying close attention to the People’s Daily to try to divine who might run China after President Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao step down in 2012.

headline.main: Photos From China Offer Scant Clues to a Succession
headline.print_headline: Photos From China Offer Scant Clues to a Succession
headline.seo: China’s Coming Leadership Change Leaves Analysts Guessing
